snippet.title: Will: Follow the Light Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
The Future Games Show at Gamescom continued its streak of world premieres with WILL: Follow The Light, a first-person, story-driven adventure game set in harsh, weathered environments. It's coming to PC and consoles in 2025

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#willfollowthelight #FutureGamesShow #FGS #gamescom
